main event: Major Ralph J. Mayfield reported sighting a large, silvery, disc-shaped object over Galveston, Texas, on September 2, 1957.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 40-50 feet in diameter,The object moved rapidly and made sudden changes in direction,He observed the object for about 3-4 minutes before it disappeared,No physical evidence such as radar detection or independent witnesses was found,The investigation concluded the sighting as unidentified.
